Properties Dialog Box

Requires: Base Development System

Right-click a control, indicator, or constant on the front panel or block diagram and select Properties from the shortcut menu to display this dialog box. You also can select multiple objects, right-click an object from the selection, and select Properties from the shortcut menu to display this dialog box. If you select multiple objects, this dialog box displays only properties that the objects share. Select similar objects to display more tabs and properties. If you select multiple objects that do not share any common properties, this dialog box does not display any tabs or properties.

If you select an object the State Diagram Toolkit automatically generated, this dialog box does not display any tabs or properties. Instead, you can right-click the object and use the shortcut menu to edit the object.

This dialog box might have the following tabs:

  • Appearance
  • Background
  • Browse Options
  • Configuration
  • Configuration (Shared Variable Node Properties)
  • Configuration (Variable Refnum Properties)
  • Cursors
  • Data Binding
  • Data Entry
  • Data Type
  • Display Format
  • Documentation
  • Edit Items
  • Key Navigation
  • Operation
  • Output Configuration
  • Plots
  • Scale
  • Scales
  • Security
  • Size
  • Text Labels
